DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Assisted Reproductive Technologies treatment G-CSF , growth factor work stem cell , may improve pregnancy rate pregnancy outcome patient experience recurrent implantation failure IVF cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Use G-CSF Treatment Recurrent Implantation Failure
DOC.detailed_description: We previously show G-CSF may useful treatment recurrent abortion . The G-CSF cytokine promote leukocyte growth , also trophoblast development . In randomized sudy investigator test cytokine treatment recurrent implantation failure IVF , leat three fail previous IVF attempt . The study conduct 100 woman recurrent implantation failure The inclusion criterion , least three previous fail IVF attempt least 8 good embryo transfer , woman le 40 year old , absence systemic disease . These woman undergo IVF cycle randomly divide two group : one ( 50 woman ) treat subcutaneous G-CSF 60 micrograms/day day transfer day β-hCG test , positive treatment continue 40 day ; group control treat subcutaneous saline solution infusion way study group . Primary outcomes consider : pregnancy rate β-hCG level 14/21/28 35 day embryo transfer .
DOC.criteria: woman 40 year old less three previous IVF cycle fail , total least 8 good embryo replace uterus chromosomal defect patient , metabolic disease ( diabetes etc . ) genetic disease ( thalassemia , cystic fibrosis , etc . )
